content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: TEENRL
      operator: empty
    - name: TEDUR
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000194
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error if TEDUR is null when TEENRL is null
Outcome:
  Message: TEDUR cannot be null when TEENRL is null
  Output Variables:
    - TEENRL
    - TEDUR
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0329
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Either TEENRL or TEDUR must be populated for each
                  Element.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.2.2
              - Cited Guidance: At least one of TEENRL and TEDUR must be populated.
                  Both may be populated.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Assumption 12
                Section: 7.2.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TE

json.Description: Raise an error if TEDUR is null when TEENRL is null

Outcome.Message: TEDUR cannot be null when TEENRL is null

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Either TEENRL or TEDUR must be populated for each Element.
At least one of TEENRL and TEDUR must be populated. Both may be populated.
